name: Prototyper BETA
description:
Create gamepad navigation prototypes in a snap with Xbox One, PlayStation 4 or Switch Pro controllers.


Create prototypes in one of two ways - Generate or Link.


Generate

Generate a complete prototype from selected component instances in a top-level frames. Great for creating a prototype from your completed UI mock.


Link

Link any selected top-level frames on your canvas into a prototype. Prototyper automatically determines their relative position and creates prototype interactions. Great for creating quick and dirty prototypes without investing into components or completed UI mocks.


Open Source

Prototyper is open source and contributions are most welcome!


Contributors

  • Alex Tokmakchiev - PS4 Controller Keycodes
  • Antoine Plu - PlayStation Controller icons
